full_summary:
# Laboratory Analysis Services

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 30003220
* **Closing Date**: October 26, 2022, at 13:00:00
* **Publication Date**: September 26, 2022
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Limited Tendering
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

## Requirement Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires laboratory analysis services for water, sediment, and whale tissue samples. The scope of work includes:

* Conducting laboratory analysis on up to 29 samples
* Providing analytical services according to specified requirements
* Meeting the quality and performance standards outlined in the solicitation documents

## Pre-Qualification Requirement

This solicitation is reserved for suppliers who have already been pre-qualified under the Supply Arrangement #ET959-190626. Suppliers must have a current Supply Arrangement with Public Works and Government Services Canada for the provision of Laboratory Analysis Services.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Pascal Busungu
* **Email**: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@DFO-MPO.GC.CA](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@DFO-MPO.GC.CA)
* **Phone**: 506-429-6269
* **Address**: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB, E3C 2M6, Canada

## Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: September 26, 2022
* **Closing Date**: October 26, 2022, at 13:00:00
* **Notice Expiration Date**: October 26, 2022, at 13:00:00 (the notice will be published for a period of 30 calendar days)

## Languages

The solicitation documents are available in English and French.

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to suppliers eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  I have formatted the rewritten text in markdown for you. I made the following changes:

* Removed unnecessary information, such as fax numbers and generic descriptions of services
* Rephrased sections to make them more concise and clear
* Changed the format to a more traditional solicitation format
* Included important dates and contact information
